element.name: TKnowledgeItem
element.short: Is a base class for all knowledge items in a text brain

element.name: TKnowledgeItem.Basis
element.short: Basis is a set of knowledge items, which are was a sources to make this new knowledge item

element.name: TKnowledgeItem.Consequences
element.short: Consequences is a list of produced knowledge items, which are have this knowledge item as a basis
element.descr: This is an opposite side of Basis: filled only when this item added to some body basis

element.name: TKnowledgeItem.ToString
element.short: String representation of this item itself

element.name: TKnowledgeItem.InfoText
element.short: Full generated text description of this knowledge item. Usually include string representation and some specific aditional info

element.name: TKnowledgeItem.IntegrateToBrain
element.descr: Note: This method need be called when this item will be ready for merge.

element.name: TBasis
element.short: TBasis is a TTabledKnowledgeBaseSubset with owner and ability to add self to owner.consequences when add that item as a basis

element.name: TTabledKnowledgeBaseSubset
element.short: Is a abstract set of knowledge items with Items property and with direct iterator over Items

element.name: TKnowledgeBaseSubset
element.short: Set of knowledge items with support to organize tree of sets: it have one link to superset and list of subsets
